translations: 可敬的，值得敬佩的；品格高尚的；保护声誉的，体面的；尊敬的；（安排或协议）公平的，公正的

sentences.sentence: The man born with disability became the champion of the Paralympics, which was very honourable.
sentences.translation: 这个人天生残疾，但是他后来成为了残奥会冠军，这非常值得人敬佩。
他们奋力打成了2:2平局，值得敬佩。

sentences.sentence: He received an honourable discharge from the army.
